name: StanfordPOS
description: This node performs Part-Of-Speech with Stanford NLP on the given input column. Refer http://www.sparkflows.io/nodes-nlp for steps to install models.jar

fields.name: inputCol
fields.description: Column containing the text for PartOfSpecch
fields.title: Text Column

fields.name: outputCol
fields.description: Output column containing the result of PartOfSpecch
fields.title: POS Column
